Posts.Content: Feb 27, 2019 01:25PM Chenye_Tripp wrote: My heart is with you. I am older, newly diagnosed and full of some of the same fears. I’m sure it is so much more frightening with a young child involved. From all my reading so far, treating cancer has made many advances. Please take some comfort from that. Take care, Chenye.
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed and terrified Hope0813
